query:
UPDATE initiatives 
SET status = 'under-review',
    evaluatedBy = 'Irvin Cruz',
    evaluatedAt = NOW()
WHERE title IN (
  'AI Social Media Content Generator',
  'Email Campaign A/B Testing Automation',
  'Predictive Customer Lifetime Value Model',
  'AI-Powered Marketing Analytics Dashboard',
  'AI Image Enhancement for Marketing Materials',
  'Custom AI Video Production Platform'
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user oYC4Lz5DqbQiGEf.root --database LVN2BBaghCkJZKnQ9H5R4v --execute UPDATE initiatives 
SET status = 'under-review',
    evaluatedBy = 'Irvin Cruz',
    evaluatedAt = NOW()
WHERE title IN (
  'AI Social Media Content Generator',
  'Email Campaign A/B Testing Automation',
  'Predictive Customer Lifetime Value Model',
  'AI-Powered Marketing Analytics Dashboard',
  'AI Image Enhancement for Marketing Materials',
  'Custom AI Video Production Platform'
);
